text: Michael Goolaerts (24 July 1994 – 8 April 2018) was a Belgian cyclist. He rode for Vérandas Willems–Crelan. He was born in Lier. Goolaerts signed his first professional contract with Lotto–Soudal as a stagiaire, starting on 1 August 2016, before signing with UCI Professional Continental team Vérandas Willems–Crelan for the 2017 season. He made his debut in the Étoile de Bessèges, During the 2018 Paris–Roubaix, Goolaerts suffered cardiac arrest and was flown to a hospital in Lille, where he died hours later at the age of 23. ==References== Category:1994 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Accidental deaths in France Category:Belgian cyclists Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Deaths in sport Category:People from Antwerp (province)
title: Michael Goolaerts
